exceptions.tactic: intros a b c nZa nZb p q canon_p canon_q eq_ab div_a_c.

original: intros a b c nZa nZb p q canon_p canon_q eq_ab div_a_c. unfold spminusf. unfold pluspf. unfold eqP. rewrite mults_dist_minuspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) by apply cs. rewrite mults_dist_minuspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) by apply cs. rewrite <- pluspf_is_minuspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) by apply cs. apply eq_ab.
